FlipCoin is an app that emulates the coin tossing phenomenon that we all grew up with. With FlipCoin you will not only be using it for fun and games as we are used to. You can also use it to make decisions in everyday life. Have you ever had a day when you simply can't decide whether you want to go to a party or go to work?
 Go ahead flip a coin. Ever wanted to ask somebody out but too afraid to take the chance?
 Let FlipCoin decide your fate!
 Like this. Do you get to say stupid lines or let the girl pass by?
 Well see for yourself. Flip a Coin. There are tons of ways to enjoy you can also use it. 
 if you want a quick bet with someone using the latest craze about Bitcoin
 You can simply put your bets 
 Just name your price and let the coin decide.

FlipCoin:How to use
 Normal
 1. To use FlipCoin normally just proceed to add two different choices. Choices should be definitive and should at least contain 6 characters or more.
 2. After adding the choices/bets click flip to simulate the coin toss.
 Rounds
 1. To use FlipCoin with rounds proceed to add choices first. After adding the choices you can add rounds depending on how many times you want to flip the coin by touching the “Rounds”. (Adding rounds provides a more thrilling way of representing choice and a strong testament of how important the decision/bet is going to be.
 2. After adding choices/bets and rounds click flip to simulate the coin toss.

FlipCoin:Reminder\nThe Choice Reminder enables users to schedule a coin toss that will help you decide on that day. Engage the thrill of randomizing your everyday lives by creating a list of reminders of choices that you are about to make that day.

FlipCoin:Widget We can sometimes be busy about other things that we tend to forget about things that could help us in on the spur of the moment decisions. Sometimes we just need a little luck and with FlipCoin, You can widgetize FlipCoin to make decisions based on a corresponding reminder that you have to set yourself about decisions that has to be made.
